emptyState.message:
This page shows statistics about parts, printers and material usage

Connect a printer, add parts and send print jobs to see data here
emptyState.title: Welcome home

tooltips.jobsPrinted: Total number of jobs printed within the specified date range
tooltips.jobsPrintedPerDay: Total number of jobs printed per day within the specified date range
tooltips.jobsToAccept: Total number of jobs that require acceptance before printing
tooltips.partsPerTemplate: Total number of parts created per template within the specified date range
tooltips.partsPrinted: Total number of parts printed within the specified date range
tooltips.partsPrintedPerDay: Total number of parts printed per day within the specified date range
tooltips.partsToApprove: Total number of parts that require approval before printing
tooltips.partTypes: Total number of parts created per part type within the specified date range
